Title: Maximum field lengths (boundary test)
street: Street name that is exactly 70 characters long for boundary testing 12
city: City name that is maximum 40 characters
state: State name that is maximum 40 characters
country: Country name that is maximum 40 characte

Title: Empty first_name
Expected_Message: The first name field is required

Title: Empty last_name
Expected_Message: The last name field is required

Title: Invalid email format
Expected_Message: The email must be a valid email address

Title: First name too long
Expected_Message: The first name may not be greater than 40 characters

Title: Last name too long
Expected_Message: The last name may not be greater than 20 characters

Title: Email too long
Expected_Message: The email may not be greater than 256 characters

Title: Phone too long
Expected_Message: The phone may not be greater than 24 characters

Title: Street too long
street: This street name is way too long and exceeds the 70 character limit set by the API validation rules
Expected_Message: The address.street may not be greater than 70 characters

Title: City too long
city: This city name is too long and exceeds the 40 character limit for validation
Expected_Message: The address.city may not be greater than 40 characters

Title: State too long
state: This state name is too long and exceeds the 40 character limit
Expected_Message: The address.state may not be greater than 40 characters

Title: Country too long
country: This country name is too long and exceeds the 40 character limit set by validation
Expected_Message: The address.country may not be greater than 40 characters

Title: Postal code too long
Expected_Message: The address.postal code may not be greater than 10 characters

Title: Invalid date format
Expected_Message: The dob does not match the format Y-m-d

Title: Invalid email format - missing @
Expected_Message: The email must be a valid email address

Title: Invalid email format - missing domain
Expected_Message: The email must be a valid email address

Title: Phone too short
Expected_Message: The phone may not be less than 8 characters

Title: Exceeding field length - first_name
Expected_Message: The first name may not be greater than 40 characters

Title: Exceeding field length - email
Expected_Message: The email may not be greater than 256 characters

Title: Invalid postal code format
Expected_Message: The postal code format is invalid
